product_name: GSI Outdoors Pioneer Enamelware Chef's Tools
long_description: The GSI Outdoors Pioneer Enamelware Chef's tools is a modern take on classic graniteware that will add a touch of elegance to your camp kitchen. Full-length stainless-steel construction ensures durability. Includes a spoon, ladle and spatula.
short_description: The GSI Outdoors Pioneer Enamelware Chef's tools is a modern take on classic graniteware that will add a touch of elegance to your camp kitchen.
